EmailTemplate.description: Confirmation message to requester upon submission of online protest.
EmailTemplate.name: Web Hearing Request Confirmation
EmailTemplate.subject: Confirmation of Your Written Protest of your Towed Vehicle
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
This email confirms that your written protest will be reviewed by a hearing officer on {!Case.Date_Hearing_Scheduled__c} at {!Case.Hearing_Time__c}.
Here is your tow hearing Case Number: {!Case.CaseNumber}. Reference this number should you have questions about your hearing.
You will receive a separate decision letter for the citation and the tow via {!Case.Hearing_Decision_Letter__c} within approximately 2-3 weeks from that time.
Regards,
SFMTA Hearing Section
